gold.user: As a conference organizer, I want to retrieve a list of all recordings for a specific conference so that I can review the discussions and share them with participants.
gold.ideal: The API should return a JSON array of recordings, including details such as SID, date created, duration, and URL for each recording.

gold.user: As a conference administrator, I want to update the metadata of a specific recording to correct the title and add notes for future reference.
gold.ideal: The API should accept a JSON payload with updated fields and return the updated recording details, confirming the changes were successful.

gold.user: As a participant, I want to fetch a specific recording of the conference to listen to my contributions and understand the context of the discussions.
gold.ideal: The API should return the details of the specific recording, including the SID, duration, and a direct link to access the audio file.

gold.user: As a privacy-conscious user, I want to delete a specific recording of a conference that contains sensitive information to ensure it is no longer accessible.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the recording and return a success message, ensuring that the recording is permanently removed from the system.
